Generation II.Gold: Its lips are the most sensitive parts on its body. It always uses its lips first to examine things.
Generation II.Silver: It always rocks its head slowly backwards and forwards as if it is trying to kiss someone.
Generation II.Crystal: The sensitivity of its lips develops most quickly. It uses them to try to identify unknown objects.
Generation II.Stadium 2: Its lips are the most sensitive parts on its body. It always uses its lips first to examine things. (Pokémon Red, Silver, or Crystal inserted) It always rocks its head slowly backwards and forwards as if it is trying to kiss someone. (Pokémon Blue, Gold, or Yellow inserted)

Generation III.Ruby: Smoochum actively runs about, but also falls quite often. Whenever the chance arrives, it will look for its reflection to make sure its face hasn't become dirty.
Generation III.Sapphire: Smoochum actively runs about, but also falls quite often. Whenever the chance arrives, it will look for its reflection to make sure its face hasn't become dirty.
Generation III.Emerald: It actively runs about, but also falls often. Whenever it falls, it will check its reflection on a lake's surface to make sure its face hasn't become dirty.
Generation III.FireRed: It always rocks its head slowly backwards and forwards as if it is trying to kiss someone.
Generation III.LeafGreen: Its lips are the most sensitive parts on its body. It always uses its lips first to examine things.

Generation IV.Diamond: It tests everything by touching with its lips, which remember what it likes and dislikes.

Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Smoochum actively runs about, but also falls quite often. Whenever the chance arrives, it will look for its reflection to make sure its face hasn't become dirty.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Smoochum actively runs about, but also falls quite often. Whenever the chance arrives, it will look for its reflection to make sure its face hasn't become dirty.

Generation VII.Ultra Sun: When it examines things, before touching them with its hands, it makes lip contact and then diligently licks all the dirt off its lips.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Highly perceptive sensors, Smoochum's lips are kept moist by its daily application of tree sap.

Generation VIII.Sword: If its face gets even slightly dirty, Smoochum will bathe immediately. But if its body gets dirty, Smoochum doesn't really seem to care.
Generation VIII.Shield: This is a very curious Pokémon. Smoochum decides what it likes and dislikes by touching things with its lips.
Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: It tests everything by touching with its lips, which remember what it likes and dislikes.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: It tests everything by touching with its lips, which remember what it likes and dislikes.
